privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Heroicsoft, we place great importance on your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the information of individuals who visit our website and use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information Collected
dataCollection.content: When placing an order or creating an account, we may collect the following information to be able to communicate with you and provide services:
items: Name, surname
Email address
Phone number
Billing and delivery address

When you visit our website, information about your device, IP address, browser type, and site usage habits may be collected. This information is used to improve our site and enhance the user experience.

dataUsage.title: Use of Information
dataUsage.content: The collected information may be used for the following purposes:
items: Processing and delivery of orders
Informing you about special campaigns and offers
Improving website performance and ensuring customer satisfaction
Fulfilling legal obligations

dataSharing.title: Sharing of Information
dataSharing.content: Heroicsoft does not sell or rent your personal information to third parties in any way. However, we may share your information in the following cases:
items: With shipping companies to deliver your orders
With authorized official authorities in accordance with legal regulations
With trusted third parties that provide analytical services for our website

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience and provide better service. Cookies are small text files saved on your device. Accepting or rejecting cookies is entirely your choice. However, disabling cookies may cause some website functions to not work.

dataSecurity.title: Security
dataSecurity.content: We take all necessary technical and administrative measures to ensure the security of your personal information. However, we would like to remind you that we cannot guarantee that data transmission over the internet is completely secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK), you have the following rights:
items: To learn whether your personal data is being processed
To request information about processed data
To request correction or deletion of your data
To object to the processing of your data

distanceSales.title: Distance Sales Contract
distanceSales.intro: This contract regulates the rights and obligations of the parties regarding the sale and delivery of the product/service ordered by the Buyer electronically from the Seller's website, in accordance with the provisions of Law No. 6502 on the Protection of Consumers and the Distance Contracts Regulation.

parties.title: ARTICLE 1 – PARTIES
parties.content: The parties to this contract are specified below:

subsections.title: Seller:
items: Company Name: Heroicsoft
Address: Dağçeşme mah. Dumlupınar cad. No: 4/2 Tavşanlı / Kütahya
Email: help@heroicsoft.com

subsections.title: Buyer:
subsections.content: The person placing the order ("Buyer") and the information declared during the order are taken as basis.

subject.title: ARTICLE 2 – SUBJECT OF THE CONTRACT
subject.content: This contract regulates the rights and obligations of the parties regarding the sale and delivery of the product/service ordered by the Buyer electronically from the Seller's website, in accordance with the provisions of Law No. 6502 on the Protection of Consumers and the Distance Contracts Regulation.

productInfo.title: ARTICLE 3 – PRODUCT/SERVICE INFORMATION
productInfo.content: The type and kind of the product/service subject to the order, quantity, brand/model, color, sales price and payment information are as specified in the information presented to the Buyer at the time the order is completed and on the invoice.

general.title: ARTICLE 4 – GENERAL PROVISIONS
items: The Buyer accepts that he/she has read and been informed about all preliminary information regarding the basic characteristics of the product/service subject to the contract, sales price, payment method and delivery on the website, and has given the necessary confirmation in the electronic environment.

The product/service subject to the contract is delivered to the Buyer or the person/institution at the address indicated by the Buyer within the period specified on the website, depending on the distance of the Buyer's place of residence, provided that the legal 30-day period is not exceeded for each product/service.

If the product subject to the contract is to be delivered to a person/institution other than the Buyer, the Seller is not responsible for the person/institution to whom it will be delivered not accepting the delivery.
The Seller is obliged to deliver the product/service subject to the contract completely, in accordance with the qualifications specified in the order and with warranty documents, if any.
The Seller is not responsible for delays in product delivery if they arise from the shipping company or force majeure.
The Buyer may exercise the right of withdrawal before the delivery of the product subject to the contract.

rightOfWithdrawal.title: ARTICLE 5 – RIGHT OF WITHDRAWAL
rightOfWithdrawal.content: The Buyer may exercise the right of withdrawal under the following conditions:

subsections.title: 5.1. Withdrawal Period
subsections.content: The Buyer may exercise the right of withdrawal within 14 days from the delivery of the product to him/her or to the person/institution at the address indicated by him/her, without giving any reason and without paying any penalty.

subsections.title: 5.2. Withdrawal Notification
subsections.content: In order to exercise the right of withdrawal, it is necessary to notify the Seller in writing to help@heroicsoft.com within this period.

subsections.title: 5.3. In Case of Exercise of Right of Withdrawal:
items: The product must be returned to the Seller unused and in its original packaging.
Return shipping costs are borne by the Buyer unless the product is defective.
After receiving the notification that the right of withdrawal has been exercised, the Seller receives the product back and refunds the product price to the Buyer within 14 days.

subsections.title: 5.4. Products Outside the Scope of Right of Withdrawal:
items: Products produced specifically for the person
Products with risk of rapid deterioration or possibility of expiration date

disputes.title: ARTICLE 6 – RESOLUTION OF DISPUTES
disputes.content: Consumer Arbitration Committees and Consumer Courts are authorized to resolve disputes arising from this contract.

effective.title: ARTICLE 7 – EFFECTIVENESS
effective.content: This contract enters into force on the date it is approved by the Buyer in the electronic environment.

processingTime.title: Order Processing Time
processingTime.content: Your software services will be activated and access information will be sent to you within 1-3 business days after payment confirmation. This period may be extended during special projects and campaign periods.

deliveryTime.title: Service Activation Time
deliveryTime.content: Delivery times for software services vary according to the type of service:
items: Standard web development and design services: Delivered within the specified time from project start
API integration and backend services: Usually activated within 1-2 weeks
Custom software projects: Delivery time is determined according to project scope and communicated to the customer

deliveryFees.title: Service Fees
deliveryFees.content: Pricing for all our software services is transparent:
items: Service prices are clearly stated at the time of order
Additional features or changes may incur extra charges
All prices are shown including VAT

tracking.title: Service Tracking
tracking.content: When your order is confirmed and your service is activated, access information and project status will be sent to you via email. You can regularly track the progress of your project.

returnConditions.title: Return Conditions
returnConditions.content: Return conditions for software services are as follows:
items: Return requests made before service activation are accepted with full refund
Return requests made after service activation and before project start are evaluated taking into account the work done
After the project starts, partial refunds can be made according to the completed work ratio
In custom-developed software projects, returns are not accepted after the project starts

returnProcess.title: Return Process
returnProcess.content: You can submit your return request by following these steps:
items: You can send your return request to help@heroicsoft.com along with your order number and reason for return
Your return request will be evaluated within 2 business days at the latest and you will be contacted
Refund process is initiated for approved return requests

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
items: Refunds for approved returns are processed within 7-10 business days depending on your payment method
Payments made by bank card are refunded to the same card account
Payments made by wire transfer/EFT are refunded to the account information you specified

exchangeConditions.title: Service Modification Conditions
exchangeConditions.content: You can contact us at help@heroicsoft.com for service modification or update requests. Changes to project scope may require additional charges.
